title: Crashs
body: Hi.. i have crash problems .. i can't go though it .. i have crash in loading screen and crash in game at 00:28 if i enter the game .. i got tired of trying every thing i make repair for files  times i follow some players fix steps .. all those can't work with me .. i got 15 time ban because of this problem i really need help as soon as possible ..

replies.body: Can you give me a bit more detail as to the behaviour you notice when the crash happens? Any error messages when the crash happens? If so, what do they say? With a bit more info, I can help resolve this for good.
please we need help it happening to all Egyptian player many people asking me for solution... really this problem annoying us we really need help as soon as possible

there is some thing new today i played a game to 10:20 from the game then i had crash . there is message (Connection Timeout: The request to the PVP.net server timed out.) they i tried to reconnect 10000 time i can't Please help me i really have enough getting ban....

i have 2 types of crashes i do have both of them are happen to me . 1st one after champ select at loading screen it does not count (0) loading then i have crash .. even i close the game or reconnecting still keep me crash. there are no error messages..
2nd time of crashes, after i pass loading screen if the load count to (100) and it happen rarely i enter the game at 00:28 sec i got crash. 
those 2 type of crashes are happening specially to Egyptian player. please we need some thing to solve it without back to problem because it happen to me many time .. and thanks for answer ...

i have same problem could you help me please ... this all happen in Egypt only and there are many people like me have same problem 
does Egypt have problems With league of legends server?? please answer

Hi.. i have the same crash problems .. i can't go though it .. i have crash in loading screen and crash in game at 00:28 if i enter the game .. i got tired of trying every thing i make repair for files times i follow some players fix steps .. all those can't work with me .. i got 15 time ban because of this problem i really need help as soon as possible ..********
